Below you will learn which programs have already been installed, what you can install yourself, and what rules the company has regarding software.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f870a3c3-b16f-4948-bf00-541012f4ba13/important.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":805,\"height\":75}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some of the links in the Adaptation Portal require direct or VPN access to the company network. These links will be marked with an asterisk *\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VPN\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(copy and paste the link into the browser line once you have access to the network). VPN access can be requested through\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://support.epam.com/ess.do?ctx=docEngine&file=svcDisplay&query=name=%22AccesstoEPAMResources_VPNtoEPAMNetwork%22\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If you do not have company equipment, or VPN access, and are unable to access the information within the links, please contact Support Team for assistance in receiving the information you require. You may also reach out to your Manager, Mentor or Human Resource team for help\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When provided with a corporate workstation (laptop), it will have the standard software package already installed on it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that installing and using unlicensed and unauthorized software is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"strictly prohibited\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". It is considered to be a serious breach of internal regulations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company performs periodic audits of software usage. If unauthorized software is discovered, the responsible employee will be subject to disciplinary action up to and including termination of the employee's contract, and/or legal action.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You should read
